column2: CORRECTED-RPT-IPO VIEW-Fund managers look to make room for AlibabaCORRECTED-IPO VIEW-Fund managers look to make room for AlibabaUPDATE 1-IPO VIEW-Fund managers look to make room for Alibaba SAN FRANCISCO/NEW YORK
